title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2217/81 of 31 July 1981 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2103/77 laying down detailed rules for the buying-in by intervention agencies of sugar manufactured from beet and cane harvested in the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2217/81 of 31 July 1981 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2103/77 laying down detailed rules for the buying-in by intervention agencies of sugar manufactured from beet and cane harvested in the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 2103/77 is hereby amended as follows:    1. The words "fixed for each sugar marketing year" in the first sentence of Article 8 (5) are replaced by "0 7035 ECU".
2. Article 14 (4) and (5) are deleted.
3. The second subparagraph of Article 17 (3) is replaced by the following:
"The cost related to the packing referred to in paragraph 2 (a) and (b) shall be fixed at a flat rate amount of 1 7408 ECU per 100 kilograms of sugar."

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 July 1981.
For the Commission
The President
Gaston THORN  (1) OJ No L 177, 1.7.1981, p. 4. (2) OJ No L 246, 27.9.1977, p. 12.
